Grand Saline Municipal Court

**Grand Saline Municipal Court**

Honorable Judge Beverley Pearson

[bpearson@grandsalinetx.gov](mailto:bpearson@grandsalinetx.gov)

**Municipal Court Coordinator: Karrie Rodgers**

krodgers@grandsalinetx.gov

Phone: 903-962-3122

Fax: 903-962-3363

**Address:**

**132 E. Frank St.**

**Grand Saline, TX 75140**
